title: Goat at the Vine (Ziegenbock am Rebstock) (in-text plate, page 25) from Tierfabeln des Aesop (Aesop's Fables)
medium: One from an illustrated book with thirty-five woodcuts (including woodcut cover, title page and ornamental initials)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 2 5/8 x 3 11/16" (6.7 x 9.4 cm); page: 13 x 9 1/16" (33 x 23 cm)
